lead_paragraph: U.S. Republican President-elect Donald Trump told the Los Angeles' mayor he would support the city's 2024 Olympics bid when the two spoke this week, NBC reported on Thursday, citing the mayor's spokeswoman.

headline.print_headline: Mayor Says Trump Backs Los Angeles' 2024 Olympic Bid: NBC
headline.main: Mayor Says Trump Backs Los Angeles' 2024 Olympic Bid: NBC
